Package org.bouncycastle.crypto.agreement.ecjpake

Support classes for Elliptic Curve Password Authenticated Key Exchange by Juggling (EC J-PAKE) key exchange.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ECJPAKECurve
    A pre-computed elliptic curve over a prime field, in short-Weierstrass form for use during an EC J-PAKE exchange.
    ECJPAKECurves
    Standard pre-computed elliptic curves for use by EC J-PAKE.
    ECJPAKEParticipant
    A participant in a Password Authenticated Key Exchange by Juggling (J-PAKE) exchange.
    ECJPAKERound1Payload
    The payload sent/received during the first round of a EC J-PAKE exchange.
    ECJPAKERound2Payload
    The payload sent/received during the second round of a EC J-PAKE exchange.
    ECJPAKERound3Payload
    The payload sent/received during the optional third round of a EC J-PAKE exchange, which is for explicit key confirmation.
    ECJPAKEUtil
    Primitives needed for a EC J-PAKE exchange.
    ECSchnorrZKP
    Package protected class containing zero knowledge proof, for an EC J-PAKE exchange.

Package org.bouncycastle.crypto.agreement.ecjpake Description

Support classes for Elliptic Curve Password Authenticated Key Exchange by Juggling (EC J-PAKE) key exchange.
